meanings.definition: An instance of one object striking another.
meanings.sent1: The loud collisions of the cars could be heard from far away.
meanings.sent2: The collisions between the billiard balls created a colorful display.
meanings.sent3: The collisions of the toy cars on the track made the children giggle.
meanings.sent4: In the world of atoms, collisions are like tiny dances of matter.
meanings.sent5: The collisions of the waves against the shore were mesmerizing to watch.

meanings.definition: A conflict or disagreement between two or more parties.
meanings.sent1: The collisions between the two rival gangs led to chaos in the streets.
meanings.sent2: The collisions of opinions in the meeting room made it hard to reach a decision.
meanings.sent3: The collisions of personalities in the office often resulted in funny misunderstandings.
meanings.sent4: In the political arena, collisions of ideas can shape the future of a nation.
meanings.sent5: The collisions of interests between the siblings caused frequent arguments.
